data.name: Dismantled 2 Demo
data.detailed_description:
Return in the depth of the nightmare...
Uncover the true fate of June at the end of Bittersweet Misery.
This demo takes place between both games and will introduce you to a part of the setting where Dismantled 2 will take place.
New enemies, new characters, new secrets...
data.about_the_game:

data.short_description: Return in the depth of the nightmare... Uncover the true fate of June at the end of Bittersweet Misery. This demo takes place between both games and will introduce you to a part of the setting where Dismantled 2 will take place. New enemies, new characters, new secrets...
data.supported_languages:
English*, French, Finnish
*languages with full audio support

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: 64-bit
  • Processor: 2.4 GHz Dual-Core
  • Memory: 4000 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Dedicated GPU - anything capable of running OpenGL 4.0 (eg. ATI Radeon HD 57xx or Nvidia GeForce 400 and higher)
  • Storage: 150 MB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX® 9.0b compatible 16-bit sound card and latest drivers

content_descriptors.notes:
This game contains frequent graphic, gory, and violent scenes.
Nudity and shocking themes such as necrophilia and abuse.
The material contained herein will definitely offend most players.
Proceed at your own risk.
Not suitable for anyone under the age of 18.
